pageProps.content:
Experience

Royal Madikwe, just like the name suggests, offers superior luxury accommodation in the heart of the Madikwe Game Reserve in South Africa.
Home to the Big 5 & a variety of other wildlife, Royal Madikwe never fails to impress. The lodge is ideal for families & friends who are looking for a luxury safari experience.

Stay

Royal Madikwe can sleep up to 10 people at a time. There are 4 double suites, 1 twin suite as well as a 2-bedroom family suite consisting of a double & twin room. Each suite is equipped with a private deck with a plunge pool, indoor & outdoor shower as well as a fireplace for those chilly winter evenings.
The lounge, dining room & well-appointed library leads to broad elevated decks that overlook a large waterhole where elephants & other game often come to drink. There is also a swimming pool & bar area where afternoons are often spent with a cocktail in hand.

Activities

Each day guests will go on 2 open 4x4 game drives. Accompanied by a qualified ranger & tracker, frequent sightings of the Big 5 can be expected.
Royal Madikwe loves to welcome families. There is also a children’s playroom with fun toys & educational games to keep them busy & entertained.

subfolders.title: Jaci's Tree Lodge
subfolders.description: In the heart of the malaria-free Madikwe Game Reserve lies Jaci’s Lodges.  This area is known for some of the best game viewing in South Africa. Jaci’s Lodges consists of two luxurious camps – Jaci’s Tree Lodge & Jaci’s Safari Lodge.  Both lodges offer unique 5-star experiences for guests looking for an intimate safari experience in a relaxed & peaceful setting.

subfolders.title: Jamala Madikwe Royal Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Owner-managed & run, Jamala Madikwe Royal Safari Lodge is located in the famous malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in an area of untamed beauty & natural splendour. This slice of paradise is the perfect stop-over for the discerning traveller who wants to enjoy excellent Big 5 game viewing along with extravagant luxuries in a private & secluded bush setting.

subfolders.title: Madikwe Hills Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Set within the 75,000 hectares Madikwe Private Game Reserve in the North West Province of South Africa, Madikwe Hills Private Game Lodge provides an authentic safari experience in a pristine bush setting. The reserve is home to Africa’s Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – so guests visiting Madikwe Hills can expect good quality game viewing throughout the year.

subfolders.title: Madikwe Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Deep in the heart of Madikwe Private Game Reserve lies the famous Madikwe Safari Lodge, a luxurious family-friendly bushveld retreat. Offering sweeping views over the game-filled plains & Waterberg mountains, Madikwe Safari Lodge consists of 3 separate safari camps: Lelapo (12 suites) - geared towards families, Kopano (4 suites) – ideal for couples & Dhitaba (4 suites) – for guests in need of absolute privacy.

subfolders.title: Morukuru Farm House
subfolders.description: Morukuru Family consists of 3 exclusive bush villas located in the malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in South Africa. These private villas include Morukuru Farm House, Morukuru Owner’s House & Morukuru River House - each villa complete with a dedicated hosting couple, butler, cleaning staff, ranger & tracker.

subfolders.title: Morukuru Owner's House
subfolders.description: Morukuru Family consists of 3 exclusive bush villas located in the malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in South Africa. These private villas include Morukuru Farm House, Morukuru Owner’s House & Morukuru River House - each villa complete with a dedicated hosting couple, butler, cleaning staff, ranger & tracker.

subfolders.title: Morukuru River House
subfolders.description: Morukuru Family consists of 3 exclusive bush villas located in the malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in South Africa. These private villas include Morukuru Farm House, Morukuru Owner’s House & Morukuru River House - each villa complete with a dedicated hosting couple, butler, cleaning staff, ranger & tracker.

subfolders.title: Royal Madikwe
subfolders.description: Royal Madikwe, just like the name suggests, offers superior luxury accommodation in the heart of the Madikwe Game Reserve in South Africa. Home to the Big 5 & a variety of other wildlife, Royal Madikwe never fails to impress.  The lodge is ideal for families & friends who are looking for a luxury safari experience.

subfolders.title: Tuningi Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Tuningi Safari Lodge is one of only a few 5-star safari lodges in the Madikwe Game Reserve that welcomes children & in doing so, allows them to be exposed to wildlife & nature. Situated in Big 5 country, the Madikwe Reserve provides only the best in malaria-free game viewing.  Guests often see lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, rhino, zebra, giraffe, hyena, impala & a variety of birds.  Madikwe is also one of the best places in Africa to see the famous African Wild dog.
